query:
SELECT 
  id,
  numeroCi,
  setorSolicitante,
  tipoServicoCompra,
  valorTotal,
  valorTotal / 100 AS valorReais,
  mesServico,
  YEAR(createdAt) AS ano
FROM despesas_v2
WHERE setorSolicitante = 'estudio'
ORDER BY numeroCi
command:

  numeroCi,
  setorSolicitante,
  tipoServicoCompra,
  valorTotal,
  valorTotal / 100 AS valorReais,
  mesServico,
  YEAR(createdAt) AS ano
FROM despesas_v2
WHERE setorSolicitante = 'estudio'
